answers.answer: Some say this can be a sign of diabetes. You may want to talk to your doctor.
Not the back of my neck , like the front of it . Could it mean that as well?
If your worried check into it. But my whole neck went black with my first in I was fine
My neck went dark too with all my pregnancy 3rd baby and its completely normal it should go away after u give birth its coz of hormones
My neck is black too idk if it's bc i have gestational diabetes
You do? Oh wow yeah I've been eating a lot of sweets and I have to take that test in about two weeks

I have gestational diabetes and my neck is black from it. I have to test my sugar 4-6 times a day. If I was you I would change my diet to help prevent it. Try to eat less sweets now I'm not saying remove them from your diet completely but don't go overboard because if you do end up having gestational diabetes like me you have a chance to have a large baby. It also ages the placenta my doctor is having me induced at 37 weeks 4 days. I'm currently 31 weeks 5 days.
Yea I have to test my sugar 4 times a day it's sooo annoying my fingers hurt from perking them so much

question: I'm starting to get a black ring around my neck . Um what is that? Is it cause I'm gaining weight?
title: Body changes
